layer.name: Fellowship
layer.definition: Building relationships with friends who are on the journey with you; mutual investment, transparency, and sharpening. 'Two are better than one' (Ecclesiastes 4:9-12). 'Iron sharpens iron' (Proverbs 27:17).

questions.text: I have people I exercise or train with — shared physical activity, not just solo workouts.
I have people who push my physical development — they challenge me to do more than I would alone.
I hold others accountable for their physical health/fitness — I ask, encourage, challenge.
I share physical activities (sports, hiking, movement) with others as a form of connection.
My physical fellowship relationships have improved my actual fitness — they've had real impact.
